title: Galaxy S7 Active Teardown - Screen Replacement - Battery Fix - Charging Port Repair
description: Awesome Smart Phone Tool Kit:  Green Pry tool:  Phone opening metal tool:   The Galaxy S7 Active.  Although this is classified as a rugged, military grade, durable phone.. Accidents can still happen. As we learned in my previous videos, the screen IS glass, and can be cracked.  Batteries in cell phones dont really last much longer than 2 or 3 years with normal use... so its nice to be able to swap it out with a new batter and put an extra year or two of life into your mobile phone.   The Galaxy S7 Active is most similar to the Galaxy S5 in design. The screen lifts up from the bottom.  The nice part about the S7 though, is that you dont have to worry about the back and menue button ribbon cables.  They are non existant in this device which makes a screen repair, or battery replacement or charging port swap a lot easier.   The charging port can be replaced as well, but it is one of the last things to come out of the cell phone.
